title: Micro-Focus Drill Variant #6
brief: Focus on precise finger placement and hand positioning for optimal performance.

steps.label: Step 2: Focus on Thumb Placement
steps.code: Practice placing thumb exactly at center of Rubik's Cube

steps.label: Step 3: Practice Rotational Finger Movement
steps.code: Rotate pinky finger by 90 degrees while maintaining thumb placement

steps.label: Step 4: Introduce Index Finger Rotation
steps.code: Rotate index finger while keeping thumb and pinky fingers in place

steps.label: Step 5: Combine Fingers
steps.code: Combine rotations of all four fingers to solve small portions of the cube
